title: Profs
content:
C-Shravya S Madhusudan.
Maths- BM Shankar
Stats-SV Venkatesh
EPD-Anuros Thomas
Chem- Monina

comments.body: Bms is so chill , the goated math teacher, goated notes, free attendance lmao, full of jokes in class lol, he is soo fuckin good

Svv- teaches really well,  solves every question in the textbook even though they arent supposed to but strict af 
Doesnt let you in if you are even 1 minute late 
Doesnt let you stay in class if you dont have textbook
Confiscates phones if they are not in silent and in your bag
Plays mental games with students If you end up on the bad side lmao
wait yall can see faculty already?
Idk about others but BMS is goated da,u don't don't have to worry about attendance and all stuff and teaching is also goated
Math - the best professor that you could ever ask for.... Monima mam is good too... Anurose Mam's amazing
Don't fuck around in SVV class, he'll abuse you on the spot, don't use your phone and sit in the front branches only. Just keep writing notes, he wont mind you.
How does he teach? Like how highly would u rate him
He's a good teacher, explains everything nicely but he's bipolar.
Imma delete this so that u won't get doxxed
